module.name: Post Answer CID PopUp
module.changelog: *2.5.0.2* fixed bug not deleting entries when ringgoup deleted, resulting in reload failures *2.5.0.1* adding GUI functionality *2.5.0.0* first instance
module.description: Provide cidpopup hook for ringgoups, provides a popup agi script that can send CID info to SugarCRM which can be then configure to provide popups on agent systems that are answering the phone.
